snippet: Three buses carrying athletes to the Olympic Village lost their way and took four hours instead of 45 minutes.
abstract: Three buses carrying athletes to the Olympic Village from Heathrow Airport lose their way in the maze of London’s streets and take four hours to arrive instead of 45 minutes.
lead_paragraph: Three buses carrying athletes to the Olympic Village lost their way and took four hours instead of 45 minutes.

headline.seo: For Olympic Athletes, 45-Minute Bus Trip Turns Into Fiasco
headline.main: Athletes Arrive in London, and Run Into a Dead End
headline.print_headline: Athletes Arrive in London, And Run Into a Dead End
